alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; Laramie Valley; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 14 at 10:47AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...STRONG WINDS ALONG THE INTERSTATE 80 CORRIDOR THROUGH EARLY AFTERNOON... Strong west to southwest winds have developed along the Interstate 80 corridor from the Laramie Valley eastward towards central Laramie county. Gusts of 55 MPH can be expected for the next few hours in these areas. Those traveling can expect sudden wind gusts that could pose a blow off and blow over risk for light weight and high profile vehicles. If encountering these strong winds...slow down and keep a firm grip on your steering wheel.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; Laramie Valley; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
